     1‚Üí# Bank CLI - A Formally Verified Banking System in Dafny
     2‚Üí
     3‚ÜíA comprehensive educational project demonstrating formal verification techniques applied to a real-world banking system. ...

        
        

            
     1‚Üí# Bank CLI - A Formally Verified Banking System in Dafny
     2‚Üí
     3‚ÜíA comprehensive educational project demonstrating formal verification techniques applied to a real-world banking system. This CLI application showcases how Dafny's verification capabilities ensure correctness properties like balance integrity, fund conservation, and transaction atomicity.
     4‚Üí
     5‚Üí## Features
     6‚Üí
     7‚Üí### Core Banking Operations
     8‚Üí- ‚úÖ Account creation and management with unique identifiers
     9‚Üí- ‚úÖ Deposit operations with balance validation
    10‚Üí- ‚úÖ Withdrawal operations with overdraft protection
    11‚Üí- ‚úÖ Transfer operations between accounts with atomic guarantees
    12‚Üí- ‚úÖ Balance inquiries with real-time accuracy
    13‚Üí
    14‚Üí### Advanced Features
    15‚Üí- ‚úÖ Transaction history tracking with filtering capabilities
    16‚Üí- ‚úÖ Tiered overdraft protection system (4 configurable tiers)
    17‚Üí- ‚úÖ File-based persistence with automatic backup
    18‚Üí- ‚úÖ Interactive command-line interface with FFI for input
    19‚Üí- ‚úÖ Comprehensive error handling with actionable messages
    20‚Üí
    21‚Üí### Formal Verification
    22‚Üí- ‚úÖ Balance integrity proofs
    23‚Üí- ‚úÖ Fee monotonicity guarantees
    24‚Üí- ‚úÖ Fund conservation across transfers
    25‚Üí- ‚úÖ Transaction completeness verification
    26‚Üí- ‚úÖ Atomicity of multi-step operations
    27‚Üí
    28‚Üí## Installation
    29‚Üí
    30‚Üí### Install Dafny
    31‚Üí
    32‚Üí**macOS:**
    33‚Üí```bash
    34‚Üí# Install .NET 8 via Homebrew
    35‚Üíbrew install dotnet@8
    36‚Üí
    37‚Üí# Add .NET to your PATH (add to ~/.zshrc or ~/.bash_profile)
    38‚Üíexport PATH="/opt/homebrew/opt/dotnet@8/bin:$PATH"
    39‚Üí
    40‚Üí# Apply the changes
    41‚Üísource ~/.zshrc  # or source ~/.bash_profile
    42‚Üí
    43‚Üí# Install Dafny
    44‚Üíbrew install dafny
    45‚Üí
    46‚Üí# Verify .NET installation
    47‚Üídotnet --version
    48‚Üí# Expected: 8.0.x
    49‚Üí```
    50‚Üí
    51‚Üí### Verify Installation
    52‚Üí```bash
    53‚Üídafny --version
    54‚Üí# Expected: Dafny 4.11.0 or higher
    55‚Üí
    56‚Üídotnet --version
    57‚Üí# Expected: 8.0.x or higher
    58‚Üí```
    59‚Üí
    60‚Üí## Quick Start
    61‚Üí
    62‚Üí### First Time Setup
    63‚Üí```bash
    64‚Üí# Install dependencies (macOS)
    65‚Üíbrew install dafny dotnet@8
    66‚Üí
    67‚Üí# Add .NET to your PATH (add to ~/.zshrc or ~/.bash_profile)
    68‚Üíexport PATH="/opt/homebrew/opt/dotnet@8/bin:$PATH"
    69‚Üí
    70‚Üí# Build the project
    71‚Üímake build
    72‚Üí```
    73‚Üí
    74‚Üí### Running the Application
    75‚Üí
    76‚Üí**Simple command (recommended for users):**
    77‚Üí```bash
    78‚Üí./bank-cli
    79‚Üí```
    80‚Üí
    81‚Üí**Developer workflow:**
    82‚Üí```bash
    83‚Üímake dev        # Verify + build + run (full workflow)
    84‚Üímake run        # Build + run (skip verification)
    85‚Üímake run-quick  # Run without rebuilding
    86‚Üí```
    87‚Üí
    88‚Üí**Direct execution:**
    89‚Üí```bash
    90‚Üí./.build/bin/Debug/net8.0/bank-cli
    91‚Üí```
    92‚Üí
    93‚Üí### Building
    94‚Üí
    95‚Üí```bash
    96‚Üímake build      # Build executable
    97‚Üímake verify     # Verify Dafny code only
    98‚Üímake clean      # Remove all build artifacts
    99‚Üí```
   100‚Üí
   101‚ÜíSee `make help` for all available commands.
   102‚Üí
   103‚Üí## Usage Example
   104‚Üí
   105‚Üí```bash
   106‚Üí# 1. Start the application
   107‚Üí./bank-cli
   108‚Üí
   109‚Üí# 2. Create your first account (option 1)
   110‚ÜíAccount ID: 1001
   111‚ÜíOwner Name: Alice Smith
   112‚ÜíInitial Deposit (cents): 100000
   113‚ÜíEnable Overdraft? (y/n): y
   114‚Üí
   115‚Üí# 3. Make a deposit (option 3)
   116‚ÜíAccount ID: 1001
   117‚ÜíAmount (cents): 50000
   118‚Üí
   119‚Üí# 4. Check balance (option 6)
   120‚ÜíAccount ID: 1001
   121‚Üí# Shows: Current Balance: $1,500.00
   122‚Üí
   123‚Üí# 5. Exit (option 0)
   124‚Üí```
   125‚Üí
   126‚Üí## Complete API Reference
   127‚Üí
   128‚Üí### 1. Create Account
   129‚Üí**Command:** `1`
   130‚Üí
   131‚Üí**Inputs:**
   132‚Üí- Account ID (nat, unique)
   133‚Üí- Owner Name (string)
   134‚Üí- Initial Deposit (cents, >= 0)
   135‚Üí- Enable Overdraft (boolean)
   136‚Üí- Max Balance Limit (cents, optional)
   137‚Üí- Max Transaction Limit (cents, optional)
   138‚Üí
   139‚Üí**Example:**
   140‚Üí```
   141‚Üí‚úì Account 1001 created successfully!
   142‚Üí  Owner: Alice Smith
   143‚Üí  Balance: $1,000.00
   144‚Üí  Overdraft: Enabled
   145‚Üí```
   146‚Üí
   147‚Üí### 2. List Accounts
   148‚Üí**Command:** `2`
   149‚Üí
   150‚Üí**Output:** Table of all accounts with balances and status
   151‚Üí
   152‚Üí### 3. Deposit
   153‚Üí**Command:** `3`
   154‚Üí
   155‚Üí**Inputs:**
   156‚Üí- Account ID (nat, must exist)
   157‚Üí- Amount (cents, > 0)
   158‚Üí- Description (string)
   159‚Üí
   160‚Üí**Example:**
   161‚Üí```
   162‚Üí‚úì Deposit successful!
   163‚Üí  Previous Balance: $1,000.00
   164‚Üí  New Balance: $1,250.00
   165‚Üí  Transaction ID: TXN-000001
   166‚Üí```
   167‚Üí
   168‚Üí### 4. Withdraw
   169‚Üí**Command:** `4`
   170‚Üí
   171‚Üí**Inputs:**
   172‚Üí- Account ID (nat, must exist)
   173‚Üí- Amount (cents, > 0)
   174‚Üí- Description (string)
   175‚Üí
   176‚Üí**With Overdraft Example:**
   177‚Üí```
   178‚Üí‚ö† Withdrawal triggers overdraft!
   179‚Üí  Requested: $1,000.00
   180‚Üí  Current Balance: $750.00
   181‚Üí  Shortfall: $250.00
   182‚Üí
   183‚ÜíOverdraft Fee Calculation:
   184‚Üí  Tier 1 ($0.01 - $100.00): $100.00 @ $25 = $25.00
   185‚Üí  Tier 2 ($100.01 - $500.00): $150.00 @ $35 = $35.00
   186‚Üí  Total Fee: $60.00
   187‚Üí
   188‚ÜíProceed? (y/n): y
   189‚Üí
   190‚Üí‚úì Withdrawal successful!
   191‚Üí  Transaction ID: TXN-000003 (Withdrawal)
   192‚Üí  Transaction ID: TXN-000004 (Overdraft Fee)
   193‚Üí  Final Balance: -$310.00
   194‚Üí```
   195‚Üí
   196‚Üí### 5. Transfer
   197‚Üí**Command:** `5`
   198‚Üí
   199‚Üí**Inputs:**
   200‚Üí- From Account ID (nat)
   201‚Üí- To Account ID (nat, different from source)
   202‚Üí- Amount (cents, > 0)
   203‚Üí- Description (string)
   204‚Üí
   205‚Üí**Example:**
   206‚Üí```
   207‚Üí‚úì Transfer successful!
   208‚Üí  From: 1001 (Alice Smith) ‚Üí $-810.00
   209‚Üí  To: 1002 (Bob Johnson) ‚Üí $3,000.00
   210‚Üí  Amount: $500.00
   211‚Üí  ‚úì Fund conservation verified
   212‚Üí```
   213‚Üí
   214‚Üí### 6. Check Balance
   215‚Üí**Command:** `6`
   216‚Üí
   217‚Üí**Output:**
   218‚Üí```
   219‚ÜíAccount: 1001 (Alice Smith)
   220‚ÜíCurrent Balance: -$810.00
   221‚Üí
   222‚ÜíBalance Breakdown:
   223‚Üí  Total Deposits: $1,450.00
   224‚Üí  Total Withdrawals: -$2,000.00
   225‚Üí  Total Fees: -$60.00
   226‚Üí  Net Transfers: -$200.00
   227‚Üí  ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ
   228‚Üí  Current Balance: -$810.00
   229‚Üí```
   230‚Üí
   231‚Üí### 7. View Transaction History
   232‚Üí**Command:** `7`
   233‚Üí
   234‚Üí**Inputs:**
   235‚Üí- Account ID (nat)
   236‚Üí- Last N transactions (optional)
   237‚Üí
   238‚Üí**Output:** Table showing:
   239‚Üí- Transaction ID

   241‚Üí- Type (Deposit/Withdrawal/Transfer/Fee)
   242‚Üí- Amount
   243‚Üí- Balance Before/After
   244‚Üí- Fee (if applicable)
   245‚Üí- Status
   246‚Üí
   247‚Üí### 8. Configure Overdraft

   302‚Üí
   303‚Üí## Configuration
   304‚Üí
   305‚Üí### Overdraft Tier Structure
   306‚Üí
   307‚Üí```
   308‚ÜíTier 1: $0.01 - $100.00 ‚Üí $25.00 fee
   309‚ÜíTier 2: $100.01 - $500.00 ‚Üí $35.00 fee
   310‚ÜíTier 3: $500.01 - $1,000.00 ‚Üí $50.00 fee
   311‚ÜíTier 4: $1,000.01+ ‚Üí $75.00 fee
   312‚Üí```
   313‚Üí
   314‚Üí### Account Limits
   315‚Üí
   316‚Üí```
   317‚ÜíMaximum balance per account: $1,000,000.00 (configurable)
   318‚ÜíMaximum transaction amount: $10,000.00 (configurable)
   319‚ÜíMaximum overdraft limit: $1,000.00 (configurable)
   320‚Üí```
   321‚Üí
   322‚Üí### File Paths
   323‚Üí
   324‚Üí```
   325‚Üí./data/bank_accounts.json - Account data
   326‚Üí./data/backups/ - Automatic backups
   327‚Üí./logs/ - Activity and error logs
   328‚Üí```
   329‚Üí
   330‚Üí### Viewing Current Configuration
   331‚Üí
   332‚ÜíYou can view all system settings at any time:
   333‚Üí```bash

   339‚Üí```
   340‚Üí
   341‚Üí## Verification Properties
   342‚Üí
   343‚Üí### 1. Balance Integrity
   344‚Üí**Property:** Account balances always reflect the sum of all transactions
   345‚Üí
   346‚Üí**Dafny Specification:**
   347‚Üí```dafny
   348‚Üíghost predicate BalanceMatchesHistory(account: Account)
   349‚Üí{
   350‚Üí  account.balance == ComputeBalanceFromHistory(account.history)
   351‚Üí}
   352‚Üí```
   353‚Üí
   354‚Üí### 2. Fee Monotonicity
   355‚Üí**Property:** Overdraft fees never decrease as overdraft amount increases
   356‚Üí
   357‚Üí**Dafny Specification:**
   358‚Üí```dafny
   359‚Üíghost predicate FeeMonotonicity(history: seq<Transaction>)
   360‚Üí{
   361‚Üí  forall i, j :: 0 <= i < j < |history| ==>
   362‚Üí    TotalFees(history[..i]) <= TotalFees(history[..j])
   363‚Üí}
   364‚Üí```
   365‚Üí
   366‚Üí### 3. Fund Conservation
   367‚Üí**Property:** Transfers preserve total system funds
   368‚Üí
   369‚Üí**Dafny Specification:**
   370‚Üí```dafny
   371‚Üíensures newFrom.balance + newTo.balance ==
   372‚Üí        old(from.balance) + old(to.balance) - totalFees
   373‚Üí```
   374‚Üí
   375‚Üí### 4. Transaction Completeness
   376‚Üí**Property:** Every operation generates exactly one transaction record
   377‚Üí
   378‚Üí### 5. Atomicity
   379‚Üí**Property:** Multi-step operations either complete fully or have no effect
   380‚Üí
   381‚Üí## Architecture
   382‚Üí
   383‚Üí### Module Structure
   384‚Üí
   385‚Üí```
   386‚Üísrc/
   387‚Üí‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Main.dfy              # Entry point and CLI loop
   388‚Üí‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Transaction.dfy       # Transaction datatypes with fee details
   389‚Üí‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Account.dfy           # Account datatypes with limits
   390‚Üí‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ OverdraftPolicy.dfy   # Tiered fee calculator
   391‚Üí‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Bank.dfy              # Bank state management
   392‚Üí‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Validation.dfy        # Input validation
   393‚Üí‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Persistence.dfy       # FFI boundary for file I/O
   394‚Üí‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ CLI.dfy               # Interactive menu system
   395‚Üí
   396‚Üíffi/
   397‚Üí‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ IO.cs                 # ReadLine/WriteLine (C#)
   398‚Üí‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ FileStorage.cs        # JSON persistence (C#)
   399‚Üí‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ LoadingAnimations.cs  # Progress indicators (C#)
   400‚Üí```
   401‚Üí
   402‚Üí### Design Principles
   403‚Üí
   404‚Üí**Immutable Datatypes:**
   405‚Üí```dafny
   406‚Üídatatype Account = Account(
   407‚Üí  id: nat,
   408‚Üí  owner: string,
   409‚Üí  balance: int,
   410‚Üí  history: seq<Transaction>,
   411‚Üí  overdraftEnabled: bool,
   412‚Üí  maxBalance: int,
   413‚Üí  maxTransaction: int
   414‚Üí)
   415‚Üí// Accounts never modified in-place; new instances created
   416‚Üí```
   417‚Üí
   418‚Üí**Separate Fee Transactions:**
   419‚Üí```dafny
   420‚Üídatatype Transaction = Transaction(
   421‚Üí  id: string,
   422‚Üí  txType: TransactionType,
   423‚Üí  amount: int,
   424‚Üí  parentTxId: Option<string>,  // Links fee to triggering transaction
   425‚Üí  childTxIds: seq<string>      // Links transaction to resulting fees
   426‚Üí)
   427‚Üí
   428‚Üídatatype TransactionType =
   429‚Üí  | Deposit | Withdrawal | TransferIn | TransferOut
   430‚Üí  | Fee(category: FeeCategory, details: FeeDetails)
   431‚Üí```
   432‚Üí
   433‚Üí## Error Handling
   434‚Üí
   435‚ÜíThe system provides clear, actionable error messages:
   436‚Üí
   437‚Üí**Account Not Found:**
   438‚Üí```
   439‚Üí‚úó ERROR: Account Not Found
   440‚Üí  Account ID: 9999
   441‚Üí
   442‚Üí  Suggestions:
   443‚Üí  ‚Ä¢ Use option 2 to list all accounts
   444‚Üí  ‚Ä¢ Verify the account ID is correct
   445‚Üí```
   446‚Üí
   447‚Üí**Insufficient Funds:**
   448‚Üí```
   449‚Üí‚úó ERROR: Insufficient Funds
   450‚Üí  Current Balance: $150.00
   451‚Üí  Requested: $200.00
   452‚Üí  Shortfall: $50.00
   453‚Üí
   454‚Üí  Options:
   455‚Üí  ‚Ä¢ Reduce withdrawal to $150.00
   456‚Üí  ‚Ä¢ Enable overdraft protection
   457‚Üí```
   458‚Üí
   459‚Üí**Overdraft Limit Exceeded:**
   460‚Üí```
   461‚Üí‚úó ERROR: Overdraft Limit Exceeded
   462‚Üí  This transaction would exceed limit by $50.00
   463‚Üí
   464‚Üí  Solutions:
   465‚Üí  ‚Ä¢ Request higher limit (option 8)
   466‚Üí  ‚Ä¢ Make a deposit first
   467‚Üí```
   468‚Üí

     1‚Üí# CLAUDE.md
     2‚Üí
     3‚ÜíThis file provides guidance to Claude Code (claude.ai/code) when working with code in this repository.
     4‚Üí
     5‚Üí## Project Overview
     6‚Üí
     7‚ÜíThis is a bank CLI application implemented in Dafny, a verification-aware programming language that allows formal verification of correctness properties.
     8‚Üí
     9‚Üí## Build System
    10‚Üí
    11‚ÜíThis project uses a clean build structure with all artifacts in `.build/` directory. See **docs/BUILD_STRUCTURE.md** for detailed architecture.
    12‚Üí
    13‚Üí### Quick Build Commands
    14‚Üí
    15‚ÜíAll build artifacts go to `.build/` and are excluded from version control.
    16‚Üí
    17‚Üí```bash
    18‚Üí# Default target: verify and build
    19‚Üímake
    20‚Üí
    21‚Üí# Just build (assumes verified)
    22‚Üímake build
    23‚Üí
    24‚Üí# Full workflow: verify, build, and run
    25‚Üímake dev
    26‚Üí
    27‚Üí# Release build
    28‚Üímake publish
    29‚Üí
    30‚Üí# Clean all artifacts
    31‚Üímake clean
    32‚Üí```
    33‚Üí
    34‚ÜíSee `Makefile` for all available targets and `make help` for detailed options.
    35‚Üí
    36‚Üí## Dafny Development
    37‚Üí
    38‚Üí### Verification and Compilation
    39‚Üí- Verify Dafny code: `dafny verify <file.dfy>`
    40‚Üí- Compile to executable: `dafny build <file.dfy>`
    41‚Üí- Run compiled program: `dafny run <file.dfy>`
    42‚Üí- Translate to target language (e.g., C#, Go, JavaScript): `dafny translate <language> <file.dfy>`
    43‚Üí
    44‚Üí### Key Dafny Concepts
    45‚Üí- Dafny requires explicit specifications including preconditions (`requires`), postconditions (`ensures`), and loop invariants
    46‚Üí- Methods must be proven to satisfy their specifications at compile time
    47‚Üí- Use `assert` statements to verify intermediate properties
    48‚Üí- Functions are pure and must terminate; methods can have side effects
    49‚Üí- Ghost code (marked with `ghost`) exists only for verification purposes and is erased at runtime
    50‚Üí
    51‚Üí## Project-Specific Development
    52‚Üí
    53‚Üí### Common Commands
    54‚Üí
    55‚Üí**Verify all Dafny code:**
    56‚Üí```bash
    57‚Üídafny verify src/Main.dfy
    58‚Üí# or using Makefile:
    59‚Üímake verify
    60‚Üí```
    61‚Üí
    62‚Üí**Build executable:**
    63‚Üí```bash
    64‚Üí# Using Makefile (recommended)
    65‚Üímake build
    66‚Üí
    67‚Üí# Or directly with Dafny + .NET
    68‚Üídafny translate csharp src/Main.dfy --output:.build/dafny/csharp/bank-cli.cs
    69‚Üídotnet build bank-cli.csproj
    70‚Üí```
    71‚Üí
    72‚Üí**Run application:**
    73‚Üí```bash
    74‚Üí# Simplest - use wrapper script
    75‚Üí./bank-cli
    76‚Üí
    77‚Üí# Or with Makefile
    78‚Üímake run        # Build and run
    79‚Üímake dev        # Verify, build, and run
    80‚Üímake run-quick  # Run without rebuilding
    81‚Üí
    82‚Üí# Or directly
    83‚Üí./.build/bin/Debug/net8.0/bank-cli
    84‚Üí```
    85‚Üí
    86‚Üí**Run specific module verification:**
    87‚Üí```bash
    88‚Üídafny verify src/Account.dfy
    89‚Üídafny verify src/Transaction.dfy
    90‚Üídafny verify src/OverdraftPolicy.dfy
    91‚Üí```
    92‚Üí
    93‚Üí**Run tests:**
    94‚Üí```bash
    95‚Üí# Using Makefile
    96‚Üímake test
    97‚Üí
    98‚Üí# Or directly
    99‚Üídafny test tests/BankTests.dfy
   100‚Üí```
   101‚Üí
   102‚Üí**Publish release build:**
   103‚Üí```bash
   104‚Üí# Creates optimized, self-contained executable
   105‚Üímake publish
   106‚Üí# Output in .build/publish/Release/
   107‚Üí```
   108‚Üí
   109‚Üí### Project Architecture
   110‚Üí
   111‚Üí- **src/Main.dfy**: Entry point with CLI loop
   112‚Üí- **src/Transaction.dfy**: Transaction datatypes with fee details
   113‚Üí- **src/Account.dfy**: Immutable account datatypes
   114‚Üí- **src/OverdraftPolicy.dfy**: Tiered fee calculator with proofs
   115‚Üí- **src/Bank.dfy**: Bank state management, atomic operations
   116‚Üí- **src/Validation.dfy**: Input validation and business rules
   117‚Üí- **src/Persistence.dfy**: FFI boundary for file I/O
   118‚Üí- **src/CLI.dfy**: Interactive menu system
   119‚Üí- **ffi/IO.cs**: C# FFI for ReadLine/WriteLine
   120‚Üí- **ffi/FileStorage.cs**: JSON persistence
   121‚Üí- **ffi/StringHelpers.cs**: String utilities
   122‚Üí
   123‚Üí### Build Output Structure
   124‚Üí
   125‚ÜíAll generated files go to `.build/` (never version controlled):
   126‚Üí
   127‚Üí```
   128‚Üí.build/
   129‚Üí‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ dafny/csharp/            # Generated bank-cli.cs from Dafny
   130‚Üí‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ bin/Debug/net8.0/        # Debug executable and DLLs
   131‚Üí‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ bin/Release/net8.0/      # Release executable and DLLs
   132‚Üí‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ obj/Debug/net8.0/        # .NET intermediate objects
   133‚Üí‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ obj/Release/net8.0/      # .NET intermediate objects
   134‚Üí‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ publish/Release/         # Self-contained distribution
   135‚Üí‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ cache/                   # Build cache
   136‚Üí‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ logs/                    # Build logs
   137‚Üí‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ temp/                    # Temporary build files
   138‚Üí```
   139‚Üí
   140‚ÜíFor detailed structure explanation, see **docs/BUILD_STRUCTURE.md**.
   141‚Üí
   142‚Üí### Key Design Decisions
   143‚Üí
   144‚Üí1. **Immutable Datatypes**: Accounts and transactions use immutable datatypes
   145‚Üí2. **Separate Fee Transactions**: Fees are separate transaction entries linked via parentTxId
   146‚Üí3. **Tiered Overdraft**: 4-tier fee structure ($25, $35, $50, $75)
   147‚Üí4. **Atomic Operations**: All operations are all-or-nothing with Result<T> pattern
   148‚Üí5. **File Persistence**: JSON storage with automatic backups
   149‚Üí6. **Clean Build Structure**: All artifacts in `.build/` separated from source code
   150‚Üí
   151‚Üí### Critical Invariants
   152‚Üí
   153‚Üí1. **Balance integrity**: `balance == ComputeBalanceFromHistory()`
   154‚Üí2. **Fee monotonicity**: Total fees never decrease
   155‚Üí3. **Fund conservation**: Transfers preserve total funds
   156‚Üí4. **Overdraft limits**: `balance >= -overdraftLimit` when enabled
   157‚Üí
   158‚Üí### Documentation
   159‚Üí
   160‚Üí**Quick Navigation:**
   161‚Üí- **docs/README.md** - Documentation hub (start here for navigation)
   162‚Üí- **docs/BUILD_STRUCTURE.md** - Build directory architecture and design
   163‚Üí- **docs/MIGRATION_GUIDE.md** - Migration from legacy artifact locations
   164‚Üí- **README.md** - User guide and installation
   165‚Üí- **SPEC.md** - Specification index with links to all specs
   166‚Üí
   167‚Üí**Detailed Specifications** (docs/specs/):
   168‚Üí- **ARCHITECTURE.md** - System design, modules, FFI, data flow
   169‚Üí- **DATA_MODELS.md** - Datatypes and configurations
   170‚Üí- **VERIFICATION_SPEC.md** - Invariants, proofs, verification requirements
   171‚Üí- **FUNCTIONAL_REQUIREMENTS.md** - Feature specifications (FR-1 to FR-10)
   172‚Üí- **ERROR_HANDLING.md** - Error categories, codes, recovery strategies
   173‚Üí- **UI_SPECIFICATION.md** - CLI design and interaction flows
   174‚Üí- **TESTING_SPEC.md** - Testing strategy and test suites
   175‚Üí- **PERFORMANCE_AND_SECURITY.md** - Performance targets and security measures
   176‚Üí- **REFERENCE.md** - Glossary, constants, error codes, JSON schema
   177‚Üí
   178‚Üí**Development Guides** (docs/guides/):
   179‚Üí- **AI_ASSISTED_GUIDE.md** - AI-assisted development workflows
   180‚Üí- **REQUIREMENTS_AND_EDGE_CASES.md** - Edge case catalog and requirements
   181‚Üí
   182‚Üí**Quick Reference:**
   183‚Üí- **CLAUDE.md** - This file (development guide for Claude Code)
   184‚Üí
   185‚Üí### Development Workflow
   186‚Üí
   187‚ÜíWhen working on new features or fixes:
   188‚Üí
   189‚Üí1. **Understand the invariants** - Review critical invariants relevant to your change
   190‚Üí2. **Write specifications** - Add `requires` and `ensures` clauses before implementation
   191‚Üí3. **Implement with verification in mind** - Write code that Dafny can verify
   192‚Üí4. **Run verification** - Use `dafny verify` or `make verify` on affected modules
   193‚Üí5. **Update documentation** - Keep specs and guides current
   194‚Üí6. **Test edge cases** - Reference docs/guides/REQUIREMENTS_AND_EDGE_CASES.md for known scenarios
   195‚Üí7. **Clean build** - Use `make clean build` to ensure no stale artifacts
   196‚Üí
   197‚Üí### Common Verification Patterns
   198‚Üí
   199‚Üí**Balance computation lemma:**
   200‚Üí```dafny
   201‚Üílemma BalanceMatchesHistory(account: Account)
   202‚Üí  ensures account.balance == ComputeBalance(account.history)
   203‚Üí```
   204‚Üí
   205‚Üí**Loop invariant example:**
   206‚Üí```dafny
   207‚Üíwhile i < |accounts|
   208‚Üí  invariant 0 <= i <= |accounts|
   209‚Üí  invariant totalBalance == SumBalances(accounts[..i])
   210‚Üí{
   211‚Üí  totalBalance := totalBalance + accounts[i].balance;
   212‚Üí  i := i + 1;
   213‚Üí}
   214‚Üí```
   215‚Üí
   216‚Üí**FFI boundary safety:**
   217‚Üí```dafny
   218‚Üímethod {:extern} ReadLine() returns (line: string)
   219‚Üí  ensures |line| >= 0
   220‚Üí```
   221‚Üí
   222‚Üí### Notes for AI-Assisted Development
   223‚Üí
   224‚Üí- **Context-efficient documentation**: Use docs/README.md to navigate and load only relevant specs for each task
   225‚Üí- **Build system**: All build artifacts in `.build/`. Never commit generated files.
   226‚Üí- **Build commands**: Use `make` targets instead of raw commands for consistency
   227‚Üí- Use docs/guides/AI_ASSISTED_GUIDE.md for Claude-assisted feature development workflows
   228‚Üí- All fee calculations must be mathematically proven in OverdraftPolicy.dfy
   229‚Üí- Balance integrity is a critical invariant - verify after any transaction changes
   230‚Üí- FFI calls to C# are unchecked - wrap with validation in Dafny
   231‚Üí- Refer to SPEC.md for specification index, then load specific docs/specs/ files as needed
   232‚Üí- For architecture: docs/specs/ARCHITECTURE.md
   233‚Üí- For datatypes: docs/specs/DATA_MODELS.md
   234‚Üí- For verification: docs/specs/VERIFICATION_SPEC.md
   235‚Üí- For build system: docs/BUILD_STRUCTURE.md and docs/MIGRATION_GUIDE.md
   236‚Üí
   237‚Üí## Build System Details
   238‚Üí
   239‚Üí### Makefile Targets
   240‚Üí
   241‚ÜíThe project includes a comprehensive `Makefile` with these main targets:
   242‚Üí
   243‚Üí```
   244‚ÜíMain Targets:
   245‚Üí  make              - Default: verify and build
   246‚Üí  make build        - Compile to .build/bin/
   247‚Üí  make rebuild      - Clean and build
   248‚Üí  make verify       - Verify Dafny code
   249‚Üí  make test         - Run Dafny tests
   250‚Üí  make run          - Build and run application
   251‚Üí  make publish      - Create Release distribution
   252‚Üí
   253‚ÜíCleaning:
   254‚Üí  make clean        - Remove all artifacts in .build/
   255‚Üí  make clean-debug  - Remove Debug build only
   256‚Üí  make clean-cache  - Remove build cache
   257‚Üí  make clean-temp   - Remove temporary files
   258‚Üí
   259‚ÜíConvenience:
   260‚Üí  make dev          - Verify, build, and run
   261‚Üí  make quick        - Skip verification, just build and run
   262‚Üí  make release      - Clean, test, and publish
   263‚Üí```
   264‚Üí
   265‚ÜíFor complete help: `make help`
   266‚Üí
   267‚Üí### Configuration Files
   268‚Üí
   269‚Üí**.csproj Project Files:**
   270‚Üí- `bank-cli.csproj` - Minimal project file
   271‚Üí- `bank-cli-full.csproj` - Complete project with FFI
   272‚Üí
   273‚ÜíBoth configured to output to `.build/`:
   274‚Üí```xml
   275‚Üí<PropertyGroup>
   276‚Üí  <OutputPath>.build/bin/$(Configuration)/$(TargetFramework)/</OutputPath>
   277‚Üí  <IntermediateOutputPath>.build/obj/$(Configuration)/$(TargetFramework)/</IntermediateOutputPath>
   278‚Üí  <PublishDir>.build/publish/$(Configuration)/</PublishDir>
   279‚Üí</PropertyGroup>
   280‚Üí```
   281‚Üí
   282‚Üí**.gitignore**
   283‚Üí- Excludes entire `.build/` directory
   284‚Üí- Excludes generated `bank-cli.cs` file
   285‚Üí- Excludes compiled binaries and DLLs
   286‚Üí- Excludes cache and log directories
   287‚Üí- See `.gitignore` for complete patterns
   288‚Üí
   289‚Üí## Environment Setup
   290‚Üí
   291‚ÜíRequired tools:
   292‚Üí1. **Dafny** - Latest version from https://github.com/dafny-lang/dafny/releases
   293‚Üí2. **.NET SDK** - Version 8.0 or later from https://dotnet.microsoft.com/download
   294‚Üí3. **Make** (optional) - For using Makefile targets
   295‚Üí
   296‚ÜíVerify installation:
   297‚Üí```bash
   298‚Üídafny --version
   299‚Üídotnet --version
   300‚Üí```
   301‚Üí
   302‚ÜíOr use: `make check-deps`
   303‚Üí
   304‚Üí## Troubleshooting Build Issues
   305‚Üí
   306‚Üí### Common Issues
   307‚Üí
   308‚Üí**"Cannot find dafny"**
   309‚Üí- Install Dafny from https://github.com/dafny-lang/dafny/releases
   310‚Üí- Add to PATH if installed manually
   311‚Üí
   312‚Üí**"Cannot find dotnet"**
   313‚Üí- Install .NET SDK from https://dotnet.microsoft.com/download
   314‚Üí
   315‚Üí**Build fails with old artifacts**
   316‚Üí- Clean build: `make clean build`
   317‚Üí- Or: `rm -rf .build/ && dotnet clean && make build`
   318‚Üí
   319‚Üí**Generated files in wrong location**
   320‚Üí- Ensure `.csproj` files have OutputPath configured to `.build/`
   321‚Üí- Run `dafny translate csharp` with `--output:.build/dafny/csharp/`
   322‚Üí
   323‚Üí**Stale verification cache**
   324‚Üí- Clear cache: `make clean-cache`
   325‚Üí- Rebuild: `make verify build`
   326‚Üí
   327‚Üí**Git tracking generated files**
   328‚Üí- Run: `git rm -r --cached .build/ && git add .gitignore`
   329‚Üí- Commit: `git commit -m "Remove tracked build artifacts"`
   330‚Üí
   331‚ÜíSee **docs/MIGRATION_GUIDE.md** for detailed troubleshooting.
   332‚Üí
   333‚Üí## Development Tips
   334‚Üí
   335‚Üí1. **Use Makefile**: Consistent commands and proper artifact placement
   336‚Üí2. **Verify first**: Run `make verify` before building to catch errors early
   337‚Üí3. **Incremental development**: `make quick` for faster iteration during development
   338‚Üí4. **Final testing**: `make test` to run full test suite before committing
   339‚Üí5. **Check dependencies**: `make check-deps` to verify setup
   340‚Üí6. **Clean before major changes**: `make clean` to ensure fresh build
   341‚Üí7. **Use dev target**: `make dev` for quick verify-build-run cycle
   342‚Üí
   343‚Üí## Getting Help
   344‚Üí
   345‚ÜíFor questions about:
   346‚Üí- **Build system**: See docs/BUILD_STRUCTURE.md or docs/MIGRATION_GUIDE.md
   347‚Üí- **Development**: See docs/guides/AI_ASSISTED_GUIDE.md
   348‚Üí- **Specifications**: See docs/specs/ and SPEC.md
   349‚Üí- **Dafny syntax**: See https://dafny.org/docs/DafnyRef/DafnyRef
   350‚Üí- **Features**: See FUNCTIONAL_REQUIREMENTS.md in docs/specs/
   351‚Üí

The user is encountering an issue where the .NET runtime is not found, even though `dotnet --version` shows 9.0.109. This is a common issue with .NET installations where the SDK is installed but the runtime is not properly linked or found.

Let me check the background bash output first, then help diagnose the issue.

The error message indicates:
- App host version: 9.0.8
- .NET location: Not found
- Failed to resolve libhostfxr.dylib

This suggests that while the .NET SDK is installed (via Homebrew at dotnet@9), the runtime libraries aren't being found. This could be because:
1. The runtime isn't installed
2. The runtime isn't in the expected location
3. The PATH or environment isn't set up correctly

I should:
1. Check the background bash output
2. Check what .NET runtimes are installed
3. Look at the actual dotnet installation paths
4. Possibly need to update the project configuration or install the correct runtime

Interesting! The user has:
- .NET SDK 9.0.109 installed at `/opt/homebrew/Cellar/dotnet/9.0.8/`
- .NET Runtime 9.0.8 installed at the same location
- The `dotnet` command is at `/opt/homebrew/bin/dotnet`

But the built application is looking for runtime version 9.0.8 and can't find it. The issue is likely that:

1. The application was built to target a specific runtime version (9.0.8)
2. But the runtime isn't being found because the PATH or DOTNET_ROOT isn't set correctly

However, I notice the user is using `dotnet` from Homebrew (at `/opt/homebrew/Cellar/dotnet/9.0.8/`) NOT from `dotnet@9` which would be at `/opt/homebrew/Cellar/dotnet@9/`.

This means the documentation I just updated is incorrect! The user should be using `dotnet` (the latest version) not `dotnet@9` (which is a versioned formula).

    42‚Üí# Set DOTNET_ROOT if not already set (helps find runtime on macOS)
    43‚Üíif [ -z "$DOTNET_ROOT" ]; then
    44‚Üí    if [ -d "/opt/homebrew/opt/dotnet/libexec" ]; then
    45‚Üí        export DOTNET_ROOT="/opt/homebrew/opt/dotnet/libexec"
    46‚Üí    fi
    47‚Üífi
    48‚Üí
    49‚Üí# Execute the DLL with dotnet (supports .NET >= 9.0 via RollForward)
    50‚Üíexec dotnet "$DLL" "$@"
    51‚Üí

            üí≠ Thinking
            

                2025-11-03 02:34:08
                
            

        

        

    

        
            
Great! The Makefile is already using `TARGET_FRAMEWORK := net9.0` on line 17, so it's dynamically configured. However, I notice that the `run` and `run-quick` targets execute `$(EXECUTABLE)` dire...

        
        

            
Great! The Makefile is already using `TARGET_FRAMEWORK := net9.0` on line 17, so it's dynamically configured. However, I notice that the `run` and `run-quick` targets execute `$(EXECUTABLE)` directly, which is the native executable that needs to find the .NET runtime.

I should update the Makefile to set DOTNET_ROOT when running the executable, similar to what I did in the wrapper script.

            ü§ñ Assistant
            

                2025-11-03 02:35:28
                
            

        

        
Perfect! I've successfully updated all documentation and fixed the runtime issue. Here's what was done:


Summary of Changes


1. Documentation Updated to .NET 9


All markdown files now reference .NET 9 instead of .NET 8:


Main Documentation:


    

  • README.md - Installation instructions, paths, version checks
    • 

  • CLAUDE.md - Build paths, environment setup
    • 



Test Documentation (7 files):


    

  • All test docs now reference net9.0 paths
    • 



2. Fixed Runtime Issue


The original error was caused by the .NET runtime libraries not being found. I fixed this by:


Updated bank-cli wrapper script:


    

  • Changed path from net8.0 to net9.0
    • 

  • Added automatic DOTNET_ROOT detection for macOS Homebrew installations
    • 

  • Updated installation instructions to use brew install dotnet or dotnet@9
    • 



Updated Makefile:


    

  • Already had TARGET_FRAMEWORK := net9.0 (correctly configured)
    • 

  • Added DOTNET_ROOT environment variable to run and run-quick targets
    • 

  • Now automatically sets DOTNET_ROOT=/opt/homebrew/opt/dotnet/libexec if not already set
    • 



3. Verified Working


Both commands now work correctly:


make run       # ‚úì Works
./bank-cli     # ‚úì Works



Root Cause


The issue was that the native executable (Mach-O binary) couldn't find the .NET runtime libraries (libhostfxr.dylib). Setting DOTNET_ROOT tells the executable where to find the runtime, which is especially important on macOS with Homebrew installations where .NET is at /opt/homebrew/opt/dotnet/libexec.


You should now be able to run the application successfully with make run!



    

    
    

    
    
    
    üîù
